sourceMeaningMnemonic: On the <radical>ground</radical>, holding a <radical>brush</radical>, is the <radical>woman</radical> you call your <kanji>wife</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You're standing above your wife, trying to figure out what she's making with her brush on the ground. If you have a real wife in real life, picture her doing this right now.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>wife</kanji> is drawing your <reading>cy</reading>borg (<ja>さい</ja>) on the ground. Oh no... now your wife is making kissy faces at the cyborg drawing.
readingInfo: Okay, so your wife may be in love with the cyborg monstrosity you created a while ago. This could become a problem.
